title: how to create PBE account ? message to riot  please help

embed.description: Hello Summoners, PBE signups are closed until further notice. The website has been in a poorly functioning state for a while now and we are trying to address all the problems at once instead of throwing a band-aid over it.

body:
* i wanna buy skin but i wanna test it first, please riot reply im not toxic player i just mute everyone 

btw i love team solo mid and c9 {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
For the time being those sign ups are still closed. I feel for you definitely, since heck, I can't even get my own PBE account DX! 

I'll do my best to reach out to everyone when the sign ups open back up, but you can stay on top of it yourself by checking the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) as well as our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news).
Currently PBE sign-up is down for maintenance and no further sign-ups can be made.
